CHANGES OF DATA CENTER’s RACKS

OF CHINA IN 2016~2018 (THOUSAND)

It is illustrated that the scale of racks of data centers of China's metropolis (eg. Beijing, Shanghai and Guangzhou) grows slowly during the last three years.

In comparison, the total number of racks in other parts of the nation (including the surrounding areas of the metropolis, central, northeastern, and northwestern of China) has grown rapidly
